content: have only 2 stitches worked go to round 1 44 stitches round 1 knit to the arm opening cast on 2 stitches knit across the back cast on 2 stitches place your new start of round marker 48 stitches round 2 knit to the end work round 2 until the sweater measures 4 from the underarm round 3 purl to the end round 4 knit to the end round 5 bind off purl wise finishing weave in ends block and enjoy taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2
